name: Post-Traumatic Myofascial Pain Syndrome
chief_complaint: I have constant pain in my shoulder and neck that won't go away after my car accident
physical_findings: palpable taut bands in trapezius muscle
reproduction of pain with trigger point pressure
treatment: physical therapy with myofascial release techniques
prognosis: Good with comprehensive treatment, though may require ongoing management for chronic cases
description: A chronic pain disorder where pressure on sensitive points in muscles (trigger points) causes pain in seemingly unrelated parts of the body. Often develops after trauma or repetitive strain injuries.
